languages.text: "Вот только..." {n}Лоб псайкера прорезают тревожные складки.{/n} "Только скрыта она была вовсе не какой-нибудь техноштукенцией с защитным полем, а мощным варп-барьером. Я бы такой ни в жизнь сама не сняла. Нас будто бы ждали, а теперь приглашают внутрь. Нужно быть начеку — кто-то шибко подкованный в ведьмовских штуках ждет нас внутри".

traits.locale_text: "Вот только..." {n}Лоб псайкера прорезают тревожные складки.{/n} "Только скрыта она была вовсе не какой-нибудь техноштукенцией с защитным полем, а мощным варп-барьером. Я бы такой ни в жизнь сама не сняла. Нас будто бы ждали, а теперь приглашают внутрь. Нужно быть начеку — кто-то шибко подкованный в ведьмовских штуках ждет нас внутри".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Except..." {n}She frowns in concern.{/n} "Except it wasn't hidden by some force field contraption, it was a powerful warp barrier. I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."
languages.original_text: "Вот только..." {n}Лоб псайкера прорезают тревожные складки.{/n} "Только скрыта она была вовсе не какой-нибудь техноштукенцией с защитным полем, а мощным варп-барьером. Я бы такой ни в жизнь сама не сняла. Нас будто бы ждали, а теперь приглашают внутрь. Нужно быть начеку — кто-то шибко подкованный в ведьмовских штуках ждет нас внутри".

traits.locale_text: "Except..." {n}She frowns in concern.{/n} "Except it wasn't hidden by some whatever force field contraption, it was a powerful warp barrier. I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “但……”{n}她担心地皱起眉头。{/n}“但在我的幻象里，这扇门并没有隐藏在力场装置后面。这是个非常强大的亚空间屏障，凭我的力量，是根本不可能把它破坏掉的。这种感觉就像是有人早就预料到了我们会来，现在这个人在邀请我们进去。我们最好做好准备，谁知道什么样的巫术在等着我们呢？”
languages.original_text: "Except..." {n}She frowns in concern.{/n} "Except it wasn't hidden by some force field contraption, it was a powerful warp barrier. I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

traits.locale_text: “但……”{n}她担心地皱起眉头。{/n}“但在我的幻象里，这扇门并没有隐藏在力场装置后面。这是个非常强大的亚空间屏障，凭我的力量，是根本不可能把它破坏掉的。这种感觉就像是有人早就预料到了我们会来，现在这个人在邀请我们进去。我们最好做好准备，谁知道什么样的巫术在等着我们呢？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Solo que...». {n}Frunce el ceño, preocupada.{/n} «Solo que no estaba oculto por ningún tipo de campo de fuerza, sino por una poderosa barrera de la disformidad. No podría haberla atravesado de ninguna forma. Es como si nos estuvieran esperando y nos hubieran abierto la puerta. Debemos prepararnos: quien sea que nos espera controla muy bien la hechicería».
languages.original_text: "Except..." {n}She frowns in concern.{/n} "Except it wasn't hidden by some force field contraption, it was a powerful warp barrier. I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

traits.locale_text: «Solo que...». {n}Frunce el ceño, preocupada.{/n} «Solo que no estaba oculto por ningún tipo de campo de fuerza, sino por una poderosa barrera de la disformidad. No podría haberla atravesado de ninguna forma. Es como si nos estuvieran esperando y nos hubieran abierto la puerta. Debemos prepararnos: quien sea que nos espera controla muy bien la hechicería».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nur ..." {n}Sie runzelt besorgt die Stirn.{/n} "Nur war sie nicht durch ein Kraftfeld verborgen, es war eine mächtige Warp-Barriere. Ich hätte so etwas nie entfernen können. Es ist fast, als hätte man uns erwartet, und als würde man uns nun einladen, hineinzukommen. Wir sollten uns vorbereitet. Jemand, der sich auf Hexerei versteht, wartet im Inneren."
languages.original_text: "Except..." {n}She frowns in concern.{/n} "Except it wasn't hidden by some force field contraption, it was a powerful warp barrier. I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ..." {n}Sie runzelt besorgt die Stirn.{/n} "Nur war sie nicht durch ein Kraftfeld verborgen, es war eine mächtige Warp-Barriere. Ich hätte so etwas nie entfernen können. Es ist fast, als hätte man uns erwartet, und als würde man uns nun einladen, hineinzukommen. Wir sollten uns vorbereitet. Jemand, der sich auf Hexerei versteht, wartet im Inneren."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ただ…」{n}彼女は心配げに眉をひそめた。{/n}「ただ、隠すのに使われていたのはフォースフィールドの装置などではなくて、強力な歪みのバリアだったの。あんなものを取り除くなんて、あたいにはできないわ。まるであたいたちが来ることを予期していて、誘っているようだった。準備を整えたほうがよさそうね…彼らの魔術を知っている何者かが、中で待っているはずよ」
languages.original_text: "Except..." {n}She frowns in concern.{/n} "Except it wasn't hidden by some force field contraption, it was a powerful warp barrier. I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ…」{n}彼女は心配げに眉をひそめた。{/n}「ただ、隠すのに使われていたのはフォースフィールドの装置などではなくて、強力な歪みのバリアだったの。あんなものを取り除くなんて、あたいにはできないわ。まるであたいたちが来ることを予期していて、誘っているようだった。準備を整えたほうがよさそうね…彼らの魔術を知っている何者かが、中で待っているはずよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Sauf que... {n}dit-elle en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Sauf qu'elle n'était pas dissimulée par une sorte de champ de force, mais par une puissante barrière du Warp. Je n'aurais jamais pu en venir à bout. C'est à croire que notre arrivée était prévue et que nous sommes à présent invités à entrer. Nous ferions mieux de nous préparer. Quelqu'un qui connaît la sorcellerie nous attend à l'intérieur. »
languages.original_text: "Except..." {n}She frowns in concern.{/n} "Except it wasn't hidden by some force field contraption, it was a powerful warp barrier. I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

traits.locale_text: « Sauf que... {n}dit-elle en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Sauf qu'elle n'était pas dissimulée par une sorte de champ de force, mais par une puissante barrière du Warp. Je n'aurais jamais pu en venir à bout. C'est à croire que notre arrivée était prévue et que nous sommes à présent invités à entrer. Nous ferions mieux de nous préparer. Quelqu'un qui connaît la sorcellerie nous attend à l'intérieur. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Tabii..." {n}Endişeyle suratını asıyor.{/n} "Bir güç perdesi tertibatı tarafından gizlenmiş olsaydı bu doğru olurdu. Gelgelelim söz konusu güçlü bir öteboyut bariyeri. Öyle bir şeyi benim kaldırmam imkânsız. Sanki birileri geleceğimizi biliyordu ve bizi içeri aldı. Hazır olsak iyi olur. İçeride bizi usta bir cadı bekliyor."
languages.original_text: "Except..." {n}She frowns in concern.{/n} "Except it wasn't hidden by some force field contraption, it was a powerful warp barrier. I could never have removed something like that. It's like our arrival was expected, and now they're inviting us in. We best be ready — someone who knows their witchcraft is waiting inside."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii..." {n}Endişeyle suratını asıyor.{/n} "Bir güç perdesi tertibatı tarafından gizlenmiş olsaydı bu doğru olurdu ama güçlü bir öteboyut bariyeriydi o. Öyle bir şeyi benim kaldırmam imkânsız. Sanki birileri geleceğimizi biliyordu ve bizi içeri aldı. Hazır olsak iyi olur. İçeride cadılıkta usta biri bizi bekliyor."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
